XI.iii.1.D.3.n
.
Amount Payable for Non-Government Markers
The amount of reimbursement will be the lesser of the
actual cost of the non-government headstone, marker, or additional engraving, or
amount determined by NCA to be in effect at the time of purchase.
Entitlement to both a government headstone and reimbursement for a non-government headstone does
not
exist.
Note
:Â  This determination is made at the end of each fiscal year and is based on the average cost of government-procured headstones and markers during that period.
